title: Interstellar
overview: A mission through a wormhole to save humanity.

overview: Batman faces the Joker.

title: La La Land
overview: A jazz musician and an actress fall in love.

overview: A boy journeys to the Land of the Dead.

overview: The Avengers assemble for the final battle against Thanos.

overview: A love story blossoms on the ill-fated Titanic voyage.

overview: Simba must reclaim his kingdom after tragedy strikes.

overview: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker discovers the truth about his reality.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Frozen
overview: A young woman must embrace her powers to save her kingdom.

title: Joker
overview: A failed comedian spirals into madness in Gotham City.

title: Finding Nemo
overview: A clownfish searches for his missing son.

title: Shutter Island
overview: A U.S. Marshal investigates a disappearance at a mental hospital.

title: The Social Network
overview: The story of Facebook's creation and the lawsuits that followed.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee a tyrant.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort's rise and fall on Wall Street.

title: A Beautiful Mind
overview: The story of mathematician John Nash and his struggle with schizophrenia.

title: Inception
overview: A thief enters dreams to steal secrets.

title: The Green Mile
overview: A death row corrections officer discovers a prisoner's mysterious gift.

title: Gladiator
overview: A Roman general seeks revenge after being betrayed and enslaved.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The story of a man with a kind heart who witnesses defining moments in history.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army.

title: Iron Man
overview: A billionaire industrialist builds a high-tech suit to fight evil.

overview: A group of intergalactic criminals must work together to save the universe.

overview: Spider-Man seeks Doctor Strange's help to restore his secret identity.

overview: T'Challa returns to Wakanda to take his rightful place as king.

overview: Thor must escape Sakaar to stop Hela and prevent Ragnarok.

overview: Batman investigates a string of murders in Gotham City.

overview: Paul Atreides leads nomadic tribes in a battle for the desert planet Arrakis.

overview: The Avengers unite to battle the powerful Thanos.

overview: The Avengers face a rift when political oversight divides them into opposing factions.

overview: Clark Kent discovers his origins and becomes Superman.

overview: Diana, princess of the Amazons, becomes Wonder Woman and joins World War I to fight evil.

title: Justice League
overview: Batman and Wonder Woman recruit superheroes to save the world from an alien threat.

overview: A mercenary gains accelerated healing powers and a twisted sense of humor.

title: Logan
overview: In the near future, an aged Wolverine cares for an ailing Professor X.

title: The Incredibles
overview: A family of undercover superheroes live a quiet life until they are forced into action.

title: Inside Out
overview: Young Riley's emotions—Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness—struggle to adjust to a new city.

title: Toy Story
overview: Woody, Buzz, and their toy friends come to life when humans are not around.
